mapper.select: insert into project.tblqna (title, user, content, bpw, regdate) values (#{title}, #{user}, #{content}, #{bpw}, now())
select bno, title, user, content, bpw, reply from project.tblqna where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, user, regdate, viewcnt, bpw, reply from project.tblqna order by bno desc limit #{page}, 10
mapper.update: update project.tblqna set viewcnt = viewcnt +1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from project.tblqna where bno > 0
select bno, title, user, regdate, viewcnt, bpw, reply from project.tblqna where bno > 0 order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
